casebody.data:
Joao ROCHA, Plaintiff-Petitioner,
v.
STATE of New Jersey and New Jersey Department of Transportation, their Agents, Servants and/or Employees, Defendants-Respondents,
and
Wan-Ru Wu, Defendant. 079632
C-106 Sept. Term 2017 Supreme Court of New Jersey. September 28, 2017

ON PETITION FOR CERTIFICATION.

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-000616-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
